title: My main accoutn got hacked
body:
Hello, i want to report that my main account got hacked. 
I contected with riot support, i sent them plenty of informatiuons even my credit card's number, IP addresses, also when when the last time i used it, pictures oif RP purchases and much much more.
They are saying that these infos arent enough, so i replied to them to invite this guy whos playing with my account to a  convertation to proof who is the real owner and they dont answer to this.
Your support service is very good thank you Riot Team.

replies.body:
Nice Support Service Riot Games. 
I want all my RP i bought untill i got my account hacked.

Ok then, why just dont ban the account for testing! To see if t he guys who is playing right now is the owner. Or something like this.
You need to test him and not let him playting with it and feeding and dropping divisions.
So if my infos are no0t enough its more fair to let a stranger to play on it right ?

Our accountt team won't restore account access unless they're absolutely sure without a shadow of a doubt it's going back to the owner.  I know you've given as much information as you can and it's been stressful, but we have to be careful and cautious with giving someone account access like that.  Even if you don't pass the first time, it's totally fine to try again!  Just fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our recovery team will take another look.  Good luck!
